lines.text: ...Something's been bothering me about this whole situation.
Yeah?
A pointless quibble, I'm sure.
No, no, I'm dead serious.
This place was a bloodbath, right? No survivors- gunshots, fire, magic.
Yeah? Where're you takin' this?
Isn't it suspicious that every living thing in this room died... except for one?
Maa-aaaa?
Oh, don't play innocent! You just watched everyone die, and didn't do a thing about it?
Sounds to me like you wanted this to happen!
Seeker, that's-
It's nonsense. Even if the goat had motive, it had no means.
Wh-
It's been chained to this w-wall the entire time. It couldn't have intervened- nor did anyone have a r-reason to target it.
A reason to target it, huh?
D-don't start getting ideas! This goat's presence is completely irrelevant!
Is it, though?
Both of you, cut it out.
Seeker, get serious. Whydah, don't feed the trolls.
D-don't feed the...?!
Sheesh, all right, Dad.
